definitions.definition: Having the quality of being difficult to delete , remove , wash away , blot out, or efface .
examples: This ink spot on the contract is indelible .
This stain on my shirt is indelible .

definitions.definition: Incapable of being canceled , lost , or forgotten .
examples: That horrible story just might make an indelible impression on the memory.

main_definition: Having the quality of being difficult to delete , remove , wash away , blot out, or efface .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Incapable of being canceled , lost , or forgotten .
